review: This surprisingly inexpensive device is a great way to put internet content on your TV. I moved my Roku off the main TV in favor of this - the Chromecast device lets me stream my Netflix just as the Roku did, but is also lets me share web pages to the big screen and play YouTube music through my home audio system.One lack that is a big one for me - no way to stream my Amazon Music library. I hope support for this is in the works.
